experience.title: Coordinated cross-organization FE engineering and product communication between Yahoo! Search and Yahoo! Shopping.

Led Global Yahoo Search FE integration with Microsoft Bing Search content partnership. Coordinated with UX design, FE/middleware integration, i18n/l10n, and data analysis. Drove multiple projects with user engagement and positive revenue impact.
Drove and led Yahoo! Search Front Page (SFP, search.yahoo.com) redesign and rollout with 40+ markets in 2022.

Organized and Strengthened Yahoo APAC TW/HK Search Product, Content, and Engineering in 2021 and 2022. Built Yahoo Masks Search and Yahoo Rapid Test Search in TW market during the COVID-19 outbreak period. Leveraged the existing search platform and integrated with the government open data API. Conducted the plan with cross-functional teams including engineering, design, product, and content analysis.

Drove unified semantic-classes framework in Search FE to speed up A/B testing in 2017Q4; A pixel-perfect project with neutral metrics judgment which shipped a flexible, reliable, and maintainable CSS framework on Yahoo Search.

Engaged in Global Search FE platform migration in 2015, 2017, 2018, and developed search functionality under different tech stacks, languages, and frameworks including/migrating PHP 5.6, PHP 7.1, YUI 3, Node.js, React, Redux, and vanilla Javascript.
Yahoo Local Search FE engineering owner on the mobile web; Involved in reflowing the modern intuitive design which reduces the action steps and impacts ~10 million PV/day.
Drove and rolled out iOS/Android Search SDK (Native App) release pipeline and leveraged with search end-to-end CI-CD integration.

awards: 2016 Yahoo Taiwan/Japan Joint Hackathon Best Remote Hack & Best Hacker Choice
2018 Yahoo Taiwan Search DD Hack Day Second Place
2019 Best Internship Award as Project Tech Lead
2022 Tech Pulse Talk Acceptance; 2018, 2020, 2022 Tech Pulse Poster Acceptance

Adopted FP-growth association rules for candidate queries, constructed alternative search assist as bucket experiment.

description: Contributed online image search application based on CCH (Contrast Context Histogram), established architectural feature-based search engine for Taiwan's historic buildings.
Assisted video streaming platform and transferred to Chinese Television System (CTS); adopted Kaltura video platform as editorial backend.
Built WASIGHT.COM, a DAVEART-liked social network for design academy students. Involved in frontend and backend system during development.
